title: Christian Non-Resistance, In All Its Important Bearings
creator: Adin Ballou
description: LibriVox recording of "Christian Non-Resistance, In All Its Important Bearings", by Adin Ballou. Read by lukeprog. In this short book, Ballou defends the notion that non-resistance (today we call it non-violence) is the superior Christian method, and the one practiced by Jesus himself. (Summary by lukeprog) For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: Librivox; audiobook; religion; non-violence; Christianity; non-fiction
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
